description.message: Adjust the Fit Screen mode on any ultrawide monitor.

settings_switch_desc.message: Enable/disable Fit Screen mode on monitors with 21:9 aspect ratio on these websites:

donate_desc2.message:
Do you want to appear here?

Donate on Patreon, Github Sponsors or join Ko-Fi's TOP3 sponsors!

settings_domains_desc.message: Add a domain (example: videofun.com) and the extension will try to fix the size of video player with the correct aspect ratio (BETA)

donate_desc1.message: Thanks to the people who support me!

settings_ratio_desc2.message: This extension overwrites the CSS selector transform:scale(x,y). Read the CSS manual if you want to change these values.

settings_ratio_desc1.message: You can overwrite the default width/height scale of the player if you use a 32:9 monitor or other ratios.

settings_domains_placeholder.message: Type the domain and press enter

settings_shortcuts.message: You can set keyboard shortcuts for this extension at: chrome://extensions/shortcuts
